StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRequestsByReques.ngUserID_PJ]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgId int ) AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED --declare @Organiza.onId as int --select @Organiza.onId = OriginatorOrgId from USMC.Request R where OriginatorUserId = @UserId SELECT ORG_ID, LONG_NAME INTO #PendingRequestTmp FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].GetOrgHierarchyMinimal(@OrgId)
SELECT R.RequestID, R.OriginatorUserId, R.RequestXml, RT.RequestTypeId, RT.RequestType, R.RequestDate, PRT.LONG_NAME RSS_NAME, P.[Last_Name] +' '+ p.[First_Name] FROM USMC.Request_PJ R JOIN USMC.RequestType RT ON RT.RequestTypeID = R.RequestTypeId INNER JOIN #PendingRequestTmp PRT ON PRT.ORG_ID = R.OriginatorOrgId le. outer Join MCRISS.[dbo].[PERSON] p on p.PERSON_ID=R.person_ID --Inner join WHERE -- R.OriginatorUserId = @UserId and R.IsCleared = 0 ORDER BY r.RequestDate DESC
END
